concept.title: About Community Discussions

conbody.p: Community Self Service in Service Cloud provides a platform for community and peer-to-peer knowledge sharing. It provides self-service users with an additional channel that community members can use to ask questions, provide answers, and discuss issues.

You can add community discussions to knowledge in your current instance to enable self-service users to get answers from discussions along side knowledge base answers. Community discussions are organized using the same product hierarchy as knowledge base articles.

You can include community discussions on the home page, the results page, and in the Knowledge Advanced version of SmartAssistant. When users search for answers on these pages, their answers will include both knowledge base articles and community discussions.

You can find more information about Community Self Service in Service Cloud User Guide. See Documentation for Oracle Service Cloud Products (Answer ID 5168) to locate the documentation for your specific release, then use the Documentation Library or the Online Help User Guide link to locate the relevant topics.
